casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Andwele Willie EAVES 388P17-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. November 16, 2017 *43Sterling Rozear, Attorney at Law, for Eaves, Andwele Willie. Marc X. Sneed, Assistant Attorney General, R. Andrew Murray, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 16th of November 2017 by Defendant for Temporary Stay:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 16th of November 2017."
